meta.home_title: Tesoro CRM - Intelligent Lead Generation for Real Estate Professionals
meta.home_description: Automate property lead generation with AI and maximize your real estate ROI. MLS integration, automatic compliance and real-time dashboard.
meta.pricing_description: Transparent pricing for AI-powered lead generation. Choose the plan that fits your office. Try free for 14 days.
meta.features_description: Discover all features of Tesoro CRM: AI-powered lead generation, MLS integrations, compliance tools and more. Everything you need for successful lead generation.

features_page.integrations_title: Tesoro CRM integrates seamlessly with 50+ platforms you already use
features_page.comparison_title: How Tesoro CRM compares to the competition
features_page.comparison_subtitle: See why 500+ agents choose Tesoro CRM
features_page.final_cta_description: Join 500+ successful agents who have tripled their lead generation with Tesoro CRM.

hero.headline: The CRM that matches properties with your clients automatically
hero.subheadline: Tesoro matches new properties with your clients in real-time. As soon as you add a property, you instantly see which clients are interested. You decide what to show.
hero.secondary_headline: Your clients respond inside their private portal
hero.secondary_subheadline: Send the proposals you approve, they receive twice-daily digests and mark interest in one click. Tesoro updates your pipeline instantly.
hero.portal_highlight_1_description: Clients mark "Interested" or "Skip" and leave notes on each listing.
hero.portal_highlight_2_description: Tesoro sends a 2x daily summary with the proposals you approved.
hero.portal_highlight_3_description: Shared history, documents and next steps in one place.

cocreated.headline: Your ideas actually get built here
cocreated.subheadline: Your feedback doesn't become a ticket that disappears. It becomes a feature within weeks.
cocreated.timeline_title: From idea to reality in weeks, not months
cocreated.comparison_traditional: Traditional CRMs: Feature request → ticket → 18 months → maybe
cocreated.comparison_tesoro: Tesoro: Feature request → conversation → 2 weeks → live
cocreated.cta_benefit: Because a good idea remains a good idea
cocreated.drawer_section_text_why: This feature was crucial because it saves agents time and improves workflow. It solves a daily problem that many customers faced.
cocreated.drawer_section_text_solution: We built a fully integrated solution that works seamlessly within the existing workflow. The feature is now live and used daily by our customers.
cocreated.drawer_timeline_step_2_text: Development and testing with daily updates

social_proof.title: Trusted by 500+ agents in the Netherlands, Belgium and Spain

features.title: Everything you need for successful lead generation
features.description: From AI-powered lead generation to compliance management - Tesoro CRM automates your workflow end-to-end.
features.feature_1_description: AI-driven lead generation identifies promising properties before they hit the market.
features.feature_2_description: Direct synchronization with all major MLS platforms for real-time market insights.
features.feature_3_description: Automatic GDPR checks and document management for worry-free compliance.

testimonials.title: What our customers say
testimonials.subtitle: 500+ agents trust Tesoro CRM for their daily lead generation workflow
testimonials.testimonial_1_quote: Tesoro CRM has tripled our acquisition ratio. The AI identifies promising properties before they come on the market.
testimonials.testimonial_2_quote: The MLS integration saves us 10+ hours per week. Everything synchronizes automatically, no more double work.
testimonials.testimonial_3_quote: GDPR compliance was always a headache. Now Tesoro handles everything automatically, including document management.

demo.title: See Tesoro CRM in action
demo.description: Discover how our AI-powered lead generation tools help you find more properties, close deals faster and stay compliant.
demo.feature_1: AI lead scoring and predictive analytics

faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Tesoro CRM
faq.answer_1: Most customers are operational within 24 hours. Our onboarding wizard imports your existing data and configures everything automatically.
faq.answer_2: We integrate with all major platforms: Funda, Idealista, Kyero, Fotocasa, and 20+ others. Custom integrations are possible.
faq.answer_3: Absolutely. We are GDPR-compliant, use end-to-end encryption and host in EU data centers. SOC 2 Type II certified.
faq.question_4: Can I cancel at any time?
faq.answer_4: Yes, no lock-in contracts. You can cancel monthly and export your data whenever you want.

lead_workflow.title: You're probably losing valuable leads. Because they're not followed up properly.
lead_workflow.subtitle: Tesoro keeps you sharp throughout the entire process. From qualifying leads to closing deals. You get warned if you let something slip.
lead_workflow.bullet_1: ⚠️ Qualify leads: Tesoro warns you if a lead hasn't been qualified for too long.
lead_workflow.bullet_2: 🎯 Convert leads: Automatic reminder to convert qualified leads into deals.
lead_workflow.bullet_3: 💼 Deal management: Stay on top of what's happening in each deal phase.
lead_workflow.bullet_4: 🔔 Never drop the ball: Proactive warnings if you let something slip.
lead_workflow.template_option2: I'll call you back later today

final_cta.title: Ready to triple your lead generation?
final_cta.description: Join 500+ successful agents who have automated their workflow with Tesoro CRM.

hero.title: Choose the plan that fits you
hero.description: All plans include 14-day free trial. No credit card required. Cancel anytime.

starter.name: Starter
starter.description: Perfect for individual agents just starting with lead generation

professional.name: Professional
professional.description: For growing teams looking to automate their lead generation

enterprise.name: Enterprise
enterprise.description: For large offices with specific requirements and integrations

addons.title: Add-ons
addons.description: Extend your plan with these add-ons
addons.addon_1_description: Add extra MLS platforms to your account
addons.addon_2_description: 24/7 priority support with dedicated account manager
addons.addon_3_description: Fully branded on your office with custom domain
addons.addon_4_description: Full API access for custom integrations

faq.title: Frequently asked questions about pricing
faq.answer_1: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade at any time. The change takes effect immediately and we charge pro-rata.
faq.answer_2: After 14 days you'll automatically be switched to your chosen plan. You'll receive a reminder beforehand.
faq.answer_3: No, all plans are without setup fees. You only pay the monthly subscription.
faq.question_4: Which payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer_4: We accept all major credit cards, iDEAL, and SEPA direct debit for annual payments.
faq.question_5: Is there a discount for annual payment?
faq.answer_5: Yes, with annual payment you get 2 months free (16% discount).
faq.answer_6: Yes, you can export all your data at any time in CSV or JSON format.

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Start your 14-day free trial today. No credit card required.

hero.title: Everything you need for successful lead generation
hero.description: From AI-powered lead generation to compliance management - Tesoro CRM offers all the tools you need to grow your real estate business.

ai.name: AI-Powered Lead Generation
ai.description: Intelligent lead generation that identifies promising properties before they hit the market
ai.feature_1_description: AI analyzes market data and predicts which properties will be sold soon
ai.feature_2_description: Personalized emails and messages are automatically sent at the right time
ai.feature_3_description: Intelligent reminders and follow-up suggestions based on behavior

mls.name: MLS Integrations
mls.description: Seamless synchronization with all major MLS platforms for real-time market insights
mls.feature_1_description: Automatic synchronization of listings, updates and market data
mls.feature_2_description: Integration with Funda, Idealista, Kyero, Fotocasa and 20+ other platforms
mls.feature_3_description: Automatic detection and merging of duplicate listings

compliance.name: Compliance & GDPR
compliance.description: Automatic compliance checks and document management for worry-free compliance
compliance.feature_1_description: Overview of all data processing activities and consent management
compliance.feature_2_description: Secure storage of contracts, IDs and other sensitive documents
compliance.feature_3_description: Complete logging of all actions for compliance audits

team.name: Team Collaboration
team.description: Work together with your team, share leads and track performance
team.feature_1_description: Central overview of all communication with leads and customers
team.feature_2_description: Assign tasks, set deadlines and track progress
team.feature_3_description: Real-time dashboards with team and individual performance metrics

smart_matching.meta_description: Automatic matching between properties and customers based on preferences, budget and location. Increase your conversion rate with AI-powered smart matching.

hero.title: Smart Property-Customer Matching
hero.description: Automatic matching between properties and customers based on preferences, budget and location. The smart algorithm learns from every interaction and improves the matches.

benefits.title: Why Smart Matching Works
benefits.benefit_1_description: Our AI algorithm achieves 96% accuracy in matching properties with the right customers
benefits.benefit_2_description: Customers find their ideal property 3x faster through smart matching
benefits.benefit_3_description: Both customers and agents report higher satisfaction with matched properties

workflow.title: How Smart Matching Works
workflow.step_1_description: Add properties manually or sync automatically from your existing systems
workflow.step_2_description: Customers fill in their preferences: budget, location, property type, and wishes
workflow.step_3_description: Our algorithm analyzes all data and creates smart matches in real-time
workflow.step_4_description: You and the customer immediately receive notifications of new matches

cta.title: Ready to work smarter?
cta.description: Discover how smart matching can transform your sales process

deal_pipeline.meta_description: Advanced deal pipeline management with automated stages, progress tracking and smart reminders. Never lose a deal again.

hero.title: Advanced Deal Pipeline Management
hero.description: Keep track of all your deals from first contact to closing. Automated stages, smart reminders and clear overview ensure you never drop the ball again.

benefits.title: Never Lose a Deal Again
benefits.benefit_1_description: Visual pipeline with all deals at different stages, from lead to closing
benefits.benefit_2_description: Smart reminders for follow-ups, appointments and important deadlines
benefits.benefit_3_description: Detailed insights into your conversion rates and bottlenecks per stage

workflow.title: From Lead to Closing
workflow.step_1_description: Automatically score and qualify incoming leads based on budget and interest
workflow.step_2_description: Schedule viewings and track customer feedback and interest level
workflow.step_3_description: Manage offers, counteroffers and negotiations with built-in communication tools
workflow.step_4_description: Handle contracts, document signing and final closing steps

cta.title: Close more deals
cta.description: See how advanced pipeline management increases your success rate

customer_portal.meta_description: Give your customers their own portal where they can view properties, provide feedback and track progress. Improve customer satisfaction and save time.

hero.title: Personal Customer Portal
hero.description: Give your customers their own portal where they can view matched properties, provide feedback and track the progress of their search. Modern, user-friendly and mobile-optimized.

benefits.title: Happy Customers, Less Work
benefits.benefit_1_description: Customers can view new matches and property details anytime, anywhere
benefits.benefit_2_description: Customers can immediately indicate interest or rejection with one click
benefits.benefit_3_description: Reduce questions and calls through self-service functionality in the portal

workflow.title: How the Customer Portal Works
workflow.step_1_description: Each customer gets their own secure dashboard with overview of matches
workflow.step_2_description: Complete property information with photos, floor plans and neighborhood info
workflow.step_3_description: Simple feedback system: interested, not interested, or request more info
workflow.step_4_description: All communication with the agent in one place, including appointments and documents

cta.title: Provide better customer experience
cta.description: Discover how the customer portal improves satisfaction and saves time

email_integration.meta_description: Seamless integration with Gmail, Outlook and other email systems. All communication automatically stored in the customer file.

hero.title: Seamless Email Integration
hero.description: Complete integration with Gmail, Outlook and other email systems. All your communication is automatically stored in the right customer file, so you never lose track of the conversation.

benefits.title: Never Search for Emails Again
benefits.benefit_1_description: All emails are automatically linked to the right customers and properties
benefits.benefit_2_description: Complete communication history per customer in one clear overview
benefits.benefit_3_description: Professional email templates for every stage of the sales process

workflow.title: How Email Integration Works
workflow.step_1_description: Connect your existing Gmail, Outlook or other email account with one click
workflow.step_2_description: Tesoro recognizes email addresses and links messages to the right customer
workflow.step_3_description: Emails are automatically organized per customer and property in your CRM
workflow.step_4_description: Use professional templates for follow-ups, offers and confirmations

cta.title: Work more efficiently
cta.description: See how email integration streamlines your communication

property_management.meta_description: Complete property management system with photo management, documents, viewing planning and status tracking.

hero.title: Complete Property Management
hero.description: Manage all your properties in one central system. From photos and descriptions to viewing schedules and document management - everything organized and easily accessible.

benefits.title: All Properties Under Control
benefits.benefit_1_description: All property information, photos and documents in one searchable system
benefits.benefit_2_description: Automatic categorization by type, location, price range and status
benefits.benefit_3_description: Instantly share property details with customers via portal or email

workflow.title: Property Management Made Easy
workflow.step_1_description: Add properties manually or import automatically from MLS systems
workflow.step_2_description: Add photos, descriptions, floor plans and all relevant details
workflow.step_3_description: Track status: available, under option, sold, with automatic updates
workflow.step_4_description: Automatically share with matching customers via the portal and email

cta.title: Organize your properties
cta.description: Discover how smart property management saves time and improves service

reporting_analytics.meta_description: Extensive reports and analytics about your performance, conversion rates, and revenue. Make data-driven decisions.

hero.title: Data-Driven Insights
hero.description: Extensive reports and analytics about your performance, conversion rates, and revenue. Real-time dashboards and automated reports give you insight into what works and what doesn't.

benefits.title: Make Smart Decisions
benefits.benefit_1_description: Live overview of your performance, leads, conversions and revenue
benefits.benefit_2_description: Weekly and monthly reports automatically in your inbox
benefits.benefit_3_description: AI predictions about market trends and opportunities

workflow.title: From Data to Insight
workflow.step_1_description: All activities, communications and results are automatically tracked
workflow.step_2_description: AI analyzes patterns and trends in your sales process
workflow.step_4_description: Use insights to optimize your strategy and improve results

cta.title: Make better decisions
cta.description: See how data-driven insights improve your results
